mapper.sql: GROUPID AS groupId, MATCHINGID AS matchingId, REPRESENTATIVEID AS representativeId, HEADCOUNT AS headCount CURRENTHEAD AS currentHead
mapper.select: SELECT G.GROUPID, G.TALENTID, G.MATCHINGID, G.HEADCOUNT, G.CURRENTHEAD, GR.USERID, M.NICKNAME FROM GROUPING G, GROUPMEBMERS GR, MEMBERS M WHERE G.GROUPID=GR.GROUPID AND G.GROUPID=#{groupId} AND GR.USERID=M.USERID
